programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. Many things can happen in Misha’s world; especially exciting adventures, mysterious investigations, hilarious competitions... all with a feeling of close friendship.

programme.title: Invincible - Michael Schumacher - EP19
programme.desc: No F1 driver has dominated the motor racing scene like Michael Schumacher, who won five consecutive world titles starting from 2000.

programme.title: Flashpoint - Borg & Mcenroe/ Tyson & Holyfield - EP12
programme.desc: Bjorn Borg and John McEnroe have set new standards in men's tennis, while Mike Tyson and Evander Holyfield have reached new summits in heavyweight boxing. These two rivalries have created historic tensions.

programme.title: Homage - Boxing Rivalries - EP2
programme.desc: We have known no greater clash than the three fights between Muhammad Ali and Joe Frazier, but there has been a more controversial one than between Mike Tyson and Evander Holyfield. Plus, possibly the most awaited fight of all time between Mayweather and Manny Pacquiao.

programme.title: Top 20 - Supernatural - EP124
programme.desc: The Top 20 is an exclusive ranking of the news or the champions who are causing a buzz on planet sport!

programme.title: The Challenge - Rafting - EP9
programme.desc: In this episode, we jump into the dangerous world of extreme rafting. We follow one of the most challenging kayak odysseys as we descend the Stikine River and discover a unique sport: ice canoeing.

programme.title: Invincible - Manchester United 1999 Treble - EP10
programme.desc: In 1999, Manchester United were invincible, becoming the first English football club to win the treble, and all this in the space of 10 days.

programme.title: Dream Teams - Spain's Davis Cup Squad - EP38
programme.desc: In this special tennis episode, we select the ultimate Spanish Davis Cup team. We do the same for the Russian Fed Cup team and choose the best team of the 1970s.

programme.title: Chill - Freeride World Tour - EP14
programme.desc: Chill presents spectacular action from Chamonix in France, the cradle of European freestyle in the high mountains. Landgraf, in Holland, organises the last leg of the Crashed Ice World Tour and Freeski Big Air from Zurich's Lakeside.

programme.title: The Short List - Top 10 NBA Characters - EP10
programme.desc: The countdown of the 10 best personalities of the NBA.

programme.title: The Iconic - A Meteoric Rise - EP37
programme.desc: Very few in the history of football have become one of the biggest names of sport in as short a time as Jude Bellingham.

programme.title: The Short List - Top 10 Most Passionate Fans in Football - EP1
programme.desc: The top 10 of football's most passionate fans.

programme.title: The Iconic - Great Again - EP34
programme.desc: After a brief absence of trophies, Spain returned to the summit of European football in 2024.

programme.title: The Iconic - The Emperor - EP40
programme.desc: Beckenbauer's heritage runs through German football like a golden thread, linking the generations from high and low.

programme.title: Flashpoint - Eric Cantona/ Don Bradman - EP20
programme.desc: Eric Cantona has transformed football, but in January 1995 he confirmed his status as the most unstable player in history, and Don Bradman was the greatest scorer in the history of cricket.

programme.title: The Iconic - More Than A Club - EP35
programme.desc: FC Barcelona is the symbol of Catalan pride and footballing excellence.

programme.title: The Challenge - FMX - EP10
programme.desc: Wake up and get ready for the race! Today in The Challenge, find out about the world of FMX by meeting its legend, Mat Rebeaud, during the Free4Style organised in the Swiss town where he was born. Plus, The Challenge goes to the Romanian trails for Romaniacs, one of the craziest 'enduro' races in the world of FMX, where people and machines are pushed to their limits.

programme.title: Invincible - Serena Williams - EP11
programme.desc: Serena Williams dominated 2015, winning three Grand Slam tournaments in that year, while carrying out a second Serena Slam.

programme.title: Dream Teams - Golf: Battle Of The Ages - EP39
programme.desc: In this special golf episode, we prepare the ultimate tournament between the best players of the 21st century and the legends of the 20th century. Who will have the honour of defending their era?

programme.title: Chill - Mandurah Women's Wakeboarding - EP15
programme.desc: The best of women's wakeboard with the coming of the IWWF to Mandurah in Australia. The magnificent Italian island of Sicily welcomes the kitesurf world tour. And finally, incredible female surfers head for the beaches of Brazil for the Rio Pro.

programme.title: The Short List - Top 10 Tennis Players - EP11
programme.desc: Report on the greatest tennis players of all time.

programme.title: Flashpoint - Moore / Woods / Gehrig - EP40
programme.desc: Female surfer Carissa Moore finds the end of the Olympic rainbow, golf master Tiger Woods makes the GOAT of all comebacks and Yankee Lou Gehrig's moving farewells to baseball.

programme.title: Foul Play - The Big Heat - EP30
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity proves fatal to a baseballing icon, the lies and deceptions of a New York Yankee and a Cincinnati legend's addiction to the game.

programme.title: Invincible - New York Yankees - EP44
programme.desc: The New York Yankees are the most important team in baseball and one of the most famous names in sport.

programme.title: The Inside Line - Ferrari - EP21
programme.desc: Ferrari is the biggest car brand in the world, a historic brand synonymous with excellence, style and power, which has propelled much more than the red team in F1 over the decades.

programme.title: The Inside Line - Kimi Raikkonen - EP1
programme.desc: In this week's episode, we portray one of the most popular drivers of Formula 1's starting grid: Alfa Romeo's Kimi Raikonnen.

programme.title: Homage - The Unconventionals Of F1 - EP10
programme.desc: We pay homage to the daredevils of the king of motor sports, Formula 1. Like the handsome kid James Hunt, the man without fear, Niki Lauda or the glacial Kimi Räikkönen.

programme.title: The Challenge - Surfing - EP11
programme.desc: In this edition of The Challenge, we go surfing in Rio and meet the sport's female pros.

programme.title: Shaq's Garage - The Rescue - EP125
programme.desc: The Orlanta Zoo needs help transferring some of their animals, but Gronk's carelessness causes problems.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal - The Edge of the World - EP19
programme.desc: The story takes place in the distant future and focuses on a boy named Yuma Tsukumo, the number one bad boy at his school. Something unexpected happens when Ryoga challenges him to a Duel as the mysterious ghost of Astral appears before them, a new legend begins.

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep10 - EP10
programme.desc: Eight kid gamers, ages eight to twelve, battle it out in ten different Roblox games to win prizes and find out who is the ultimate gamer! Video gamer, football star, and children’s book author Rashad Jennings hosts!

programme.title: Baby Einstein - Meet the Orchestra: First Instruments
programme.desc: At 12 months, babies can identify specific sounds, and they re also starting to match the sounds they hear with the objects that make them. Meet the Orchestra™ -- First Instruments presents your little "maestro" with a playful introduction to the sights and sounds of a real orchestra -- from the clashing of cymbals to the purring of the cello and everything in between!

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Gratefulness - EP107
programme.desc: In this episode, Nova will invite the children to a new expedition to the world of values. Together, they will learn about gratitude, the importance of giving "thanks" and appreciating what we have to always see the positive side of life. Curious will teach us about gifts such as love and friendship which are invisible but very valuable and we should be grateful to have them.

programme.desc: From the moment babies are born, they use their developing senses to discover the world. In terms of sight, bold patterns in contrasting colors or black and white are initially preferred. As for sounds, Mother s gentle voice, in any language, is music to baby's ears. Language Nursery: Voices From Many Lands acquaints your baby with the sounds of foreign language by presenting delightful, visually stimulating images accompanied by spoken passages, natural sounds and music.

programme.desc: In this episode of Kids' Planet, we will make a trip to discover what two important words mean: "Peace" and "Harmony". programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: Your Children
programme.desc: Anja and Frank are holidaying by the Baltic Sea with their two children. Anja leaves them alone for a while, but upon return, they are nowhere in sight. While searching for them, Anja discovers that Frank has never told her the truth about his father.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: Lost In Marseille
programme.desc: Bruno, a stay-at-home father of two, gets back in touch with his masculinity when his wife is kidnapped in Marseille. Instead of the planned holiday on the Côte d'Azur, Bruno gets deeper and deeper into an intrigue, pursued by police and mafia.

programme.title: Governance
programme.desc: Renzo, a brilliant and unscrupulous manager is forced to quit his position as general manager of an oil group after an investigation for corruption. Convinced that a young colleague betrayed him, he plots his revenge, but the situation gets out of hand.

programme.title: Submission
programme.desc: Lúcia is raped by her husband and presses charges against him. In her quest for justice, she must battle her husband who is the son of the State's Vice Attorney, and the Portuguese legal system with its patriarchal beliefs.

programme.title: Ricky
programme.desc: When Katie, an ordinary woman, meets Paco, an ordinary man, something magical and miraculous happens: a love story. From this union will be born an extraordinary baby: Ricky.

programme.title: Murder Party
programme.desc: Jeanne, a brilliant architect, is appointed to restore the sumptuous Daguerre mansion owned by an eccentric family. When the patriarch is found dead during a murder party, Jeanne finds herself caught up in a real-life investigation to unmask the killer.

programme.title: Suso's Tower
programme.desc: When his best friend, Suso, dies, Cundo returns home for the first time in 10 years to say good-bye. He discovers Suso had a dream to build a tower so that he could see life from a different perspective. Cundo resolves to realise his friend’s wish.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: Unsinkable
programme.desc: In 1981, the newly built and unsinkable rescue boat RF2 sinks on an early mission, killing nine. Henrik, son of the captain blamed for the disaster, must investigate amidst resistance from fishermen fearing job losses and authorities dreading scandal.

programme.title: Manta Manta: Legacy
programme.desc: Ex-racer Bertie is facing financial issues with his car repair shop and go-kart track. He plans to participate in an upcoming 90’s race to solve his money problems, but he is suddenly asked by his ex-wife to take care of their son.

programme.title: Gravedigger
programme.desc: A gravedigger disrupts his routine work, by stealing from a corpse resting in peace but karma catches up to him.

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.
